name: Jordi Marqués Llaberia
intro: Engineer by training and passionate about software development and agile methodologies.
mission: My mission is to drive teams towards delivering high-quality software, leveraging all available tools to ensure rapid and constant feedback on the state of each product area.
belief: I firmly believe that for an agile team to function, it must focus on fostering continuous improvement and enabling its members to adapt to challenges, thus achieving solid solutions aligned with business needs, always placing the people who grow the software at the center.
quote: "Optimism is an occupational hazard of programming; feedback is the treatment"
presentation:
Hello! My name is Jordi Marqués Llaberia, and I am a QA Engineer with extensive experience in software quality assurance, test automation, and Agile methodologies. I have worked with companies such as Vibia, Scopely, SEAT CODE or Glovo, ensuring high-quality software and optimizing testing processes.

My expertise includes:
- Test automation with Playwright, Cucumber, and Jenkins.
- Agile and Extreme Programming (XP) environments.
- API and mobile testing.
- Continuous Integration and bug tracking with JIRA and Xray.

I am passionate about improving testing strategies and automation techniques to deliver high-quality software. Feel free to reach out to discuss QA, automation, or best testing practices!
